snippet: The family of a young man who was killed at the Rikers Island jail said guards encouraged some inmates to assault others to help maintain control.
abstract: New York City agrees to pay $2 million to Charnel Robinson, mother of Christopher Robinson, 18-year-old man killed at the Rikers Island jail by a group of inmates; family claims that Robinson, who had been jailed for a parole violation, was beaten by a gang of youths who had been encouraged by guards to assault others inmates to help maintain control.
lead_paragraph: The family of a young man who was killed at the Rikers Island jail said guards encouraged some inmates to assault others to help maintain control.
